LanguageData.GrenadeArmageddon.label: Inferno
LanguageData.GrenadeDetonator.label: thermalblast
LanguageData.GrenadeDynamite.label: TNT
LanguageData.GrenadeFirecracker.label: microexplosion
LanguageData.GrenadeStasis.label: elektronic field
LanguageData.GrenadeStick.label: Nitroreaction
LanguageData.Weapon_GrenadeArmageddon.label: Holy Hand grenade
LanguageData.Weapon_GrenadeArmageddon.description:
Brother Maynard brought this with him.
Bible, Lost Book of Armaments, Capital III, Verse 9-21: And Saint Attiloc raised the hand grenade up on high, saying, "O Lord, bless this Thy hand grenade that, with it, Thou mayest blow Thine enemies to tiny bits in Thy mercy." And the Lord did grin, and the people did feast upon the lambs and sloths and carp and anchovies and orangutans and breakfast cereals and fruit bats and large chu... --Skips-- And the Lord spake, saying, "First shalt thou take out the Holy Pin. Then, shalt thou count to three. No more. No less. Three shalt be the number thou shalt count, and the number of the counting shall be three. Four shalt thou not count, nor either count thou two, excepting that thou then proceed to three. Five is right out. Once the number three, being the third number, be reached, then, lobbest thou thy Holy Hand Grenade of Antioch towards thy foe, who, being naughty in My sight, shall snuff it."
LanguageData.Weapon_GrenadeDetonator.label: Thermal Detonator
LanguageData.Weapon_GrenadeDetonator.description:
Grenade with a thermal blasting composition. Unloads in a blizzard of ice shards.
The belt is loaded with these babies.
LanguageData.Weapon_GrenadeDynamite.label: Dynamite
LanguageData.Weapon_GrenadeDynamite.description:
Grenade with a nitro blasting composition. Unloads in a heavy explosion. Once lighted, you have to throw.
The belt is loaded with these babies.
LanguageData.Weapon_GrenadeFirecracker.label: Firecracker
LanguageData.Weapon_GrenadeFirecracker.description:
Multicompound explosive with a blasting composition. Small Bursts. Relies on a good hand.
The belt is loaded with these babies.
LanguageData.Weapon_GrenadeInferno.label: Inferno grenade
LanguageData.Weapon_GrenadeInferno.description:
Grenade with a brand blasting composition. Detonates in an inferno.
The belt is loaded with these babies.
LanguageData.Weapon_GrenadeStalk.label: Stick grenade
LanguageData.Weapon_GrenadeStalk.description:
Stalk Hand Grenade with a unique design. The grenade mounts a Trinitron charge head within a steel cylinder atop a wooden handle. The mixture inside detonates harder than anything else seen so far, while being incredible easy to handle the same time. This type dominated not 1 but 2 of 3 world wars on planet earth, long before the planetary union was founded and the great confederation happened.
The belt is loaded with these babies.
LanguageData.Weapon_GrenadeStasis.label: Electrocuter
LanguageData.Weapon_GrenadeStasis.description:
Grenade with a lightning charged blasting unit that detonates on impact. Unloads in a cloud of electricity. Has only limited holding time.
The belt is loaded with these babies.
